name: Gratia
description:
Gratia is a short, narrative role-playing game with an emphasis on gratitude and friendship! Play as a slime, unravel the mysteries of the town of Gratia, and make some friends along the way!

This game was created as a directed study over the span of one fifteen-week semester. The development process from start to finish is documented on GitHub, and the devlog video playlist is on YouTube.

Credits:

Game by Joshua Whittom

Music by Javan Whitney-Warner

Art: Tiny 16 by Lanea Zimmerman
